select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, password, salt, name, phone, created_date, img, role, email, id_number, deposit_bank, account_holder, bank_account, address, release_days, ecoin, total_coin, on_sale_coin, tradable_coin, sold_coin, release_coin, release_frozen_coin, encash_frozen_cash_coin, on_buy_ecoin, cash_coin, earnings, level, introducer_id, introducer_uid, ecoin_set_flag, rule_id, state, trade_password, trade_salt, last_modified_date, shop_points, version ) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{depositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{onSaleCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradableCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{soldCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseFrozenCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{encashFrozenCashCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{onBuyEcoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{earnings,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introducerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introducerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecoinSetFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeSalt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopPoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update user
